lyric:
[00:01.000] 作词:Shawn Mendes,Scott Harris,Geoff Warburton,Teddy Geiger,Khalid Robinson,Nolan Lambroza
[00:02.000] 作曲:Shawn Mendes,Scott Harris,Geoff Warburton,Teddy Geiger,Khalid Robinson,Nolan Lambroza
[00:09.37]Here I am stuck on this couch scrolling through my notes
[00:13.51]Heart was broken still not growing nah
[00:19.23]Waking up to headlines filled with devastation again
[00:23.14]My heart is broken but I keep going
[00:29.31]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[00:34.96]No I won't let it change me
[00:38.16]Never losing sight of the one I keep inside
[00:42.57]Now I know it yeah I know it
[00:47.63]You can't take my youth away
[00:50.14]This soul of mine will never break
[00:52.41]As long as I wake up today
[00:55.04]You can't take my youth away
[00:57.44]You can't take my youth away
[00:59.78]This soul of mine will never break
[01:02.09]As long as I wake up today
[01:04.67]You can't take my youth away
[01:06.53]You can't take my youth away
[01:09.30]It's hard to sleep at night knowing what's outside
[01:13.65]Feeling hopeless I need focus
[01:19.13]You hit me with words I never heard come out your mouth
[01:23.11]To be honest I don't want it no
[01:28.73]
[01:29.53]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[01:34.91]No I won't let it change me
[01:37.70]

[01:40.52]Soul of mine will never break
[01:42.87]As long as I wake up today

[01:52.44]As long as I wake up today
[01:55.04]You can't take my youth away
[01:56.93]You can't take my youth away can't take my youth
[02:01.55]You can't take my youth away
[02:03.89]
[02:04.45]Oh yeah
[02:06.31]
[02:07.84]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[02:13.33]No I won't let it change me
[02:16.23]
[02:17.48]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[02:22.90]No I won't let it change me
[02:26.18]You can't take my youth away
[02:28.61]Soul of mine will never break
[02:30.87]As long as I wake up today
[02:33.34]You can't take my youth away youth away
[02:35.89]You can't take my youth away
[02:38.02]Soul of mine will never break
[02:40.40]As long as I wake up today
[02:42.92]You can't take my youth away oh yeah
[02:45.52]You can't take my youth away
[02:47.78]Soul of mine will never break
[02:50.13]As long as I wake up today
[02:52.55]You can't take my youth away
[02:54.89]You can't take my youth away
[02:57.33]Soul of mine will never break
[02:59.65]As long as I wake up today
[03:02.21]You can't take my youth away
[03:04.09]You can't take my youth away
tlyric:
[by:Cyneburga_Meadow]
[00:09.37]我深陷于沙发内 翻读笔记
[00:13.51]心碎不堪 还未痊愈
[00:19.23]再一次被毁灭性的头条新闻惊醒
[00:23.14]即便我心残损 我也依旧前行
[00:29.31]即便伤痕累累 我也毫无怨言
[00:34.96]我不会为其做出丝毫改变
[00:38.16]永远不会将内心之人忘却
[00:42.57]如今我已经明晰
[00:47.63]你无法篡夺我的美好韶华
[00:50.14]我的灵魂永不磨灭
[00:52.41]只要今天我还能起身
[00:55.04]你无法篡夺我的美好韶华
[00:57.44]你无法篡夺我的美好韶华
[00:59.78]我的灵魂永不磨灭
[01:02.09]只要今天我还能起身
[01:04.67]你无法篡夺我的美好韶华
[01:06.53]你无法篡夺我的美好韶华
[01:09.30]彻夜难眠 却对此外的世事有所闻
[01:13.65]内心绝望无助 我需要聚精凝神
[01:19.13]你那些从未说过的话将我中伤
[01:23.11]实话实说 我很不喜欢这种滋味
[01:29.53]即便伤痕累累 我也毫无怨言
[01:34.91]我不会为其做出丝毫改变
